attributes.action: name  the members off parliament who voted against taking no deal off the table
attributes.additional_details: people who voted have not be given what they voted for  which is leave
attributes.background: think it wrong what the members off parliament have done not listen to the people who voted for leave

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The names of MPs who vote in the House of Commons are published. You can see the lists of names for all votes here:

https://commonsvotes.digiminster.com/
